::Killfest::

Killfest recieves the transmission from Ominous, thinking it over for 
a second. "One second," he replies to the Energonian, "I'll be right 
back with the answer."

He sends a transmission to Motormaster. "Motormaster, this is kinda 
your idea, and I got a faction offering to help us out here if they 
can keep the Autobots and the Ark. I don't have much interest either 
way, so what do you think?"




--- In nbwrpg@y..., JP3884@a... wrote:
>        Megatron placed the disk on the pedastal and then waited for 
the show 
> to begin. Rampage and Marine stayed back, and watched in amazement.
> 
>        The three Energonian Crafts bhurst into the crossfire. They 
suddenly 
> blazed blue as there smal lshields engulfed the vessles. Then ,they 
split up 
> to go to thier tasks.
>        "We have more vessles coming from planetside, sir. Maximal 
and 
> Predacon. I guess this is really, really important." Putnam said, 
taking his 
> seat at the weapons station.
>        Ominous grimaced, "Well, I doubt we'd have much success in 
destroying 
> the Ark. All I want is to capture the Autobots and put them under 
our 
> control."
>        "Mabey we should help out some of the Predacons, it would be 
faster 
> than trying to take the Ark ourselfs." Akron said over the speaker.
>        He nodded. It seemed stratigically sound at this 
point. "Open a 
> channle to Killfest. ...Killfest? This is Commander Ominous Prime 
of the 
> Energon forces. I am willing to aid you if you allow us some 
control over 
> what will become of the Autobots, or the Ark. Our energon based 
weapons are 
> excellent, and after enough bombarding we can slice right through 
those 
> shields. Do you agree to the terms?"
